alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:27AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Berrien, Lanier and central Lowndes Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 127 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ray City to near Lake Park. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Lakeland, Valdosta, Ray City, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Dasher, Naylor, Courthouse, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Hansell, Valdosta Regional Airport, I-75 At Exit 5, I-75 At Exit 11, Stockton and Teeterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
